talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What's up, Free? You look so serious.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Free$
This has never happened before…
Hmm…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Eek! Don't greet me so enthusiastically. You're making me nervous!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Free$
{user_nick}! In the right place at the right time!
This is great.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That laughter sounds evil!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Free$
Heh heh heh... I just found something very peculiar.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You're the expert joker around here, not me…!!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Free$
{user_nick}, this is a very serious situation we're dealing with.
This is no time for jokes.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I thought this was no time for jokes. So where is it this time?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Free$
Now, stop your crap and listen.
I think a new Nest has been created.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Hey, you said it yourself no more jokes! Just tell me where it is.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Free$
Well, I don't know.
I can definitely feel the Nest……

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#a82424>Velskud</FONT> has probably connected the new Nest to the <FONT color=#a82424>Garden of Time and Space</FONT>.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Free$
I'm telling you the truth.
Well, that's why I looked so serious.
There is a new Nest but I can't locate it.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I knew you would send me again.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Free$
Aha! You're right. There was no need for me to worry.
Whoever's Nest it is, I'm sure {user_nick} will destroy it in no time if it is connected to the Garden of Time and Space.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That's true.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Free$
You're the only person in Saint Haven who can be trusted with such a job, {user_nick}.
You're courageous, strong, and decisive.
You were always the one who managed to clear the Nests.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>All right. I'll go and check it out.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Free$
Now, please hurry.
I don't know whose Nest it is but I'm sure you can find it in the Garden of Time and Space,
like all the other Nests.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Accept Quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Unknown Nest$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Good day, Priestess. I heard that a <FONT color=#a82424>new Nest</FONT> has appeared.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
Oh, it's you, {user_nick}. Welcome.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>We should destroy the Nest, of course. Just tell me which way to go.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
So you've heard about it already? What should we do about it…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Huh? Why not?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
Well… {user_nick}, to tell you the truth,
you cannot go to the new Nest through the Garden of Time and Space.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I can't go to the new Nest through the Garden? Does the new Nest even exist?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
Signs of a new Nest are being detected but for some unknown reason, it is not connected to the Garden of Time and Space.
Velskud is working hard on the matter right now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well... Free felt it too. I guess it really does exist.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
The Order of Darkness has confirmed its existence and Velskud can also feel its presence too.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>On the other side of the Monolith... You mean in <FONT color=#a82424>Mistland</FONT>?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
Velskud said the new Nest seems to be on the other side of the Monolith.
He's probably at the Monolith to investigate more on it right now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Mistland? Could it be <FONT color=#a82424>Hirendel</FONT>…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
I'm afraid that's probably right.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>There's someone on my mind. I'll go there and investigate.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
Do you have an idea whose Nest it could be?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You can leave it to me.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
I will let Velskud know that you went to Mistland to check on the issue.
I hope you can find clues on how to solve this situation.

$Geraint$
Are you done with the stuff in Saint Haven?
I don't think so. Why don't you go back and finish them?

$Traveller Free$
Good luck!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Tell him that a Child crossed the Monolith and that Labyrinth has been created.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
{user_nick}! You took such a long time that I was getting worried about you.
Is everything all right?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But still, it's our fault that a Child crossed over to the other world.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
I told you so! I knew that stubborn grouch can't protect what Argenta left behind.
Just as I thought.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's hard to say that we're not responsible for what happened. We even lost Rubinart...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
…….
Hey, you're making it sound like we are the ones at fault.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm not sure. Can you investigate on that?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Hmph! We didn't do anything wrong. Everything will be fine if we find Rubinart.
Anyway, I wonder how a Child could get past the Monolith's force field.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So you can feel it too.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Why should I?
I can't even stand the annoying new Nest!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Could it be Hirendel?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Of course! There's no way I can't sense this disgusting feeling.
I think the owner of the Nest is fundamentally different from me but the Nest seems big and well fortified.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Indeed... Thank you. Don't forget what I asked you to do too.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
It's highly likely to be him if a Child created a Nest of that size around here.
Go to Vernicka and get more information.
He has been looking quite distraught recently.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Receive Rewards)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Completed$</html>

$Geraint$
Hmph. Don't order me around, human.
You just do your own stuff and find Vernicka.

$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
Please hurry over to Mistland.
You must find the root cause of the issue.

$Traveller Free$
Good luck!

journal.title: Creation of a Nest
journal.contents:
Traveller Free has sensed a new Nest but she can't get any information on it. Try getting more information about the Nest at the Garden of Time and Space.

Garden of Time and Space - Priestess of Darkness Madeleine
journal.destination: Talk to Priestess of Darkness Madeleine

journal.title: Prediction of a Nest
journal.contents:
It looks like a new Nest has been created in Mistland. Go to Mistland and find out what is happening.

Merca's Heart - Geraint
journal.destination: Talk to Geraint at Merca's Heart
journal.todo_msg: Find out more information from Geraint in Merca.
